transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan mehul sir anuj baat kar raha tha sir India mart se
Customer: Haan haan
Executive: Sir mere ko call kiya karo sir mere alava na kisi ko call mat kiya karo India mart se India mart se baat kar raha hu sir India mart se haan haan aap na mere ko hi call kiya karo sir mere alava kisi ko call mat kiya karo sir
Customer: Are wo mere ko samajh me nahi aata bhai
Executive: Kya sir
Customer: Haan bolo bhai
Executive: Hello mehul ji baat kar rahe hain na
Customer: Haan haan mehul ji bolo
Executive: Mehul ji anuj baat kar raha hu India mart se
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm
Executive: Main ye bol raha hu mere alava na kisi ko call mat kiya karo aap mere ko hi call kiya karo kisi bhi cheez ke liye par aapka number hai nahi na
Customer: Are maine us din whatsapp to kiya tha aapko link vagaira kiya tha na video video meet pe apan ne connect kiya tha pehle hi din maine aapko bataya tha kaise kaise kya kya use karna hai save nahi kara tha kya aapne
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm nahi kiya tha aapka number
Executive: Are mane sab sambhalni padti mane hamara vahi ban jaye ye badhu handle karak maru
Customer: Kya keh rahe ho
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello inka dost to wo handle karo unko mere ko pata nahi rehta unko call kar diya directly
Executive: Achcha usko block kar diya
Customer: Nahi nahi usko call kar diya ye idhar customer care me call kar diya directly dekhne ke liye
Executive: Customer care pe call karte ho na hmm hmm hmm isme dikkat ye hai customer care pe ji ji haan aisa hua tha ki jo maine product listing kiya hua hai na to uski jo lead aati hai wo genuine lead aati nahi hai wo matlab wo alag alag abhi abhi abhi main aapko ek cheez batau aapka account na abhi live hua hai just 10 din bhi nahi hue aaj ja ke daswa din
Customer: Unhone humko suggestion diya ki aap customer care me matlab unhone request raise kar di hai to jo banda aayega na wo humko name suggest karega aap apne name nahi koi banda nahi aayega aapke pass
Customer: Are unhone request raise kar di hai bhai
Executive: Are koi banda nahi aayega aapke pass koi banda nahi aayega
Customer: Kyu nahi aayega
Executive: Aapka jo account hai na head office me hai
Customer: Aapka account head office se take over hai
Executive: Jo bhi solution hoga sab online hoga
Customer: To unhone request raise ki hai na bhai
Executive: Are wo mere pass hi to call aayi thi main bol raha hu na aap 9696 wale pe bhi call karoge na wo mere pass hi aayegi
Customer: Are shivani baat kar rahi thi shivani chaudhary
Executive: Main main lunch pe gaya honga to main nahi honga to fir dobara kisi team ne utha liya hoga mere se
Customer: Achcha koi khan karke tha kuch naam to unka
Executive: Shiva main bata deta hu kya naam tha naam tha unka ek minute rukiyega updated by pehle aamir khan ne uthai hogi ticket ha aamir khan ne fir uske baad fir uske baad kisne aamir khan se baat hui hai hmm aamir khan se hui fir shivani chaudhary ne usse baat hui hogi thodi der usse thodi der pehle ha mera ha ha hmm main bolu na lunch ka time tha na lunch pe main nahi honga baje
Customer: To matlab ye koi aayega nahi physical humko matlab suggestion physical nahi sara online hi rahega online hi
Customer: To unhone bola ki hamara premium hai to physical banda aa sakta hai
Executive: Nahi premium to head office se milega na unko udhar se thodi nahi milega aap bataye issue kya hai issue kya hai issue kya hai main google meet ke through aapko unko bata to diya issue maine
Customer: Are unko aisa bataya maine ki jo mere pass jo lead aati hai na haan haan haan to wo genuine lead nahi aati matlab main jo sale karta hu na usse alag hi cheez aa rahi hai naam change kar ha for example main hai na crystal kitchen bech raha hu barabar to mere ko toys ki aati hai wo sab kya hai mere ko to matlab ye sab to main bech nahi raha cup aa raha hai fir matlab dish vagaira ye sab aa raha hai to ye sab to main bech nahi raha to fir isliye aur matlab unhone mere ko aisa bola ki isliye nahi aa raha hai kyuki aapka jo naam hai na wo genuine naam nahi hai wo jo jab koi bhi client ya koi bhi requirement wala banda koi bhi search karega na to usko matlab pata nahi chalega ki bhai ye kya hai to aapka matlab jo aage aana chahiye ye kisne bola ye cheez kisne bola
Customer: Yahi khan chand ne are
Customer: To unhone fir request ki koi nahi ek kaam ek kaam karte hai mehul ji ek kaam karte hai hum kal to sunday hai theek hai hmm aur aaj india mart ka hai main ek meeting fix kar leta hu tuesday ko monday ko off hai india mart ka hmm theek hai apan ek bari subah ye ab aap hi ke pass rahega na first time maine jisse baat ki thi unke pass different lag rahi thi hmm aap mera number note kar lo pehle to personal number bhi jaise kabhi office me nahi hota chutti pe hota hu to mere dono number maine teeno number diye the us din aapko 98 wala bhi 9811 number 9811 78 hmm 78 ke baad 9591 theek hai ek to ye wala ha ye mera personal number hai theek hai 9811789591 ha ab dusra number note kar lo office wala 89 sir main save kar lijiye ha save karo india mart india mart naam kya bola aapka anuj anuj gupta anuj gupta ha ji india mart india mart account manager ka name save kar lo theek hai ab dusra number note kar lo mera sir ek minute likh lijiye batau ek minute ek minute bataiye 8929 hmm 8929 likh liya ha ha four time five 495 are 495 nahi four time five four time five ha ji ha kar diya fir uske baad likhiye 21 21 ye bhi save kar lo ye bhi ye whatsapp pe nahi hai 8929 four time five ha ji 21 okay ha ji ha ji ha ji hmm hmm hmm theek hai ho gaya abhi main ye aamir ji se aapka account manga raha hu ispe na naam likh dijiyega anuj gupta meri baat ho gayi hai ek minute rukiyega hum meeting kar lenge tuesday theek hai kyuki kal bhi off hai parso bhi off hai hmm hmm hmm ye parso kyu hai monday monday hai kyuki aaj hai na saturday ko aaj office hai is vajah se achcha hmm to aaji baat kyu nahi kar sakte tuesday itna lamba kya cheez aaji nahi tab tak tab tak isme isme tab tak main pata kya karwaunga isme keyword aur addon ke liye bhej de raha hu main marketing walo ke pass keyword ke liye bhej de raha hu mere pass ye sunday tak update ho ke aa jayega unka nahi rehta main kya bol raha hu ke unhone jo bola na wo baat mere ko sahi lagi hai abhi kya cheez wo jo bola na ke ye jo naam barabar nahi hai mera mere jo product ke jo name hai na wo matlab user friendly nahi hai user friendly nahi hai main bhej deta hu main catalog correction ke liye bhej deta hu aap tension mat lijiye main check kara lunga nahi main abhi team ke pass bhej dunga automatically mere pass mail aa jayega then monday tak ho jayega unki chutti nahi hoti monday ko acha matlab aapke end se ho jayega na wo sab ha ji ha ji matlab main karwa raha hu to mere end se hi hoga na aur kiske end se hoga mere liye are aisa nahi bola unhone kya bola ki banda aayega idhar aapko suggestion nahi nahi nahi dekho abhi abhi aapke pass koi physical banda nahi aayega abhi jo bhi hai aapke account ka as a company ki taraf se wo main hu kya aap apne end se dekh lijiye to fir ha ha mere ko na ek minute rukiyega ek minute rukiyega abhi kyuki bhai confusion abhi matlab ho raha hai ki wo bol raha hai ki aayega aap bol rahe nahi matlab pata nahi kya bola unhone aise matlab wo do do matlab sentence ho rahe matlab confusion ho raha hai ki ek bol raha hai ki aayega ek bolna nahi aayega pata nahi chal raha matlab exactly kya problem kya hai wo nahi samajh aa rahi are aap abhi tension nahi lo thoda sa abhi na use karo jyada se jyada use karne layak hai hi nahi bhai abhi abhi 10 din bhi nahi dekho main abhi dekho aap unko jante ho divine crystal walo ko divine crystal ocean aap hi ke udhar se divine crystal naam batau kya ha batao kam se hai ruko divine naam hai inka mr patel kam se hai gujarat se naam naam kya hai unka proper naam bolo na ek minute are naam kabhi pucha hi nahi maine patel sir karke baat karta hu ruko aapko main number deta hu kya karunga main unka aap hi ke idhar se aap hi ke idhar se nahi aap mera matlab main kya bol raha hu ki aap mera matlab catalog thoda proper kijiye aur genuine lead aani wo bas thoda aap thoda sa patience rakho theek hai ka jo aa rahi hai na dekho main ek baat batau main kya bol raha hu lead aa rahi hai aisa nahi aa rahi hai genuine aaye na to matlab aane lagegi aane lagegi mehul ji thoda sa abhi start kiya aapne aapko khud hi pata chal jayega ki india mart ke lead platform pe lead post ho rahi hai kon si genuine hai aur kon si fake hai aapko khud hi dikh jayega thoda sa experience hone lagega theek hai to isko matlab correct karwa lijiye ha isko main usko wo karwa leta hu theek hai ek minute ruko aamir ji se pehle account mangata hu main kyuki aapne customer care pe call kar di na ticket unke pass account chala gaya hai lead us pe na abhi wo aayega us pe ek minute rukiye chalo main abhi isko main bhej deta hu theek hai hello mehul ji ha ha main bhej deta hu theek hai abhi mail aayega to us pe naam likh dena theek hai aamir ji ka hata ke mera anuj gupta likh dena theek hai theek hai naam theek hai theek hai ek minute ruko main abhi call karwa raha hu main abhi na jo apne manager hai na unse call bhi karwa raha hu ek minute rukiye bhej dena account bhej dena theek hai aur band kar dena are ye sab are mehul ji hello ha ha ha main abhi call karwa raha hu aapko ek minute rukiyega theek hai okay okay call karna aapko
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants only the executive to call him.

- The leads are not genuine.

- No physical person for suggestion.



Resolution:

- Assured that only he will call.

- Explained that the account is new.

- Will fix a meeting on Tuesday.

- Asked to save his numbers.

- Will send for catalog correction.

- Will ask the manager to call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to write his name on the mail.

- Executive will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, meeting, executive
